name: Lydia
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Will you be my valentine's!! Yes! No! Blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something for our first valentines to make it
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me you said Yes.  Haha! Am not taking No! for an answer.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
